thread.title: Peace On Earth Can Be Achieved
thread.title_full: Peace On Earth Can Be Achieved - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MichaelBrooke
title: Peace On Earth Can Be Achieved
text: My experience at citizenM in NYC was incredible. The accommodations were clean, fun, peaceful, fare priced and trendy. The staff ALWAYS went beyond and above what was expected. I was especially impressed by the managers, and Ashley and Anthony! I could only dream about staying in each of the properties around the world - even if this retired school teacher could find the means to do so.
